title: Ep 141: Start Where You Are with Adren Myrin
itunes:title: Ep 141: Start Where You Are with Adren Myrin
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree share the results of their listener survey all about cleansers! Then, Arden Myrin (Insatiable, Shameless, Little Miss Little Compton) joins them to talk about healing parental relationships, the learning curve that comes with grief, and ...
description:
Kate and Doree share the results of their listener survey all about cleansers! Then, Arden Myrin (Insatiable, Shameless, Little Miss Little Compton) joins them to talk about healing parental relationships, the learning curve that comes with grief, and how both home-decorating and The Bachelor are a part of her self-care practices.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35. 
  • BOMBAS - For 20% off your first purchase of Bombas, visit bombas.com/forever35.
  • FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • Deep Dive with Vanessa Mdee - Listen to Deep Dive with Vanessa Mdee on Apple, Acast, or wherever you get your podcasts.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
